.. _examples:

Listener Examples
=======

.. Warning::
   This documentation is work in progress.


Command Listener
----------------

.. code-block:: yaml

    listeners:
    - event: dissemination
        request:
        destination: FOO
        stream: enfo
        triggers:
        - type: command
            working_dir: examples
            command: ./script.sh --date ${request.date} -s ${request.stream}
            environment:
            STEP: ${request.step}
            TIME: "The time is ${request.time}"
